majorVersion.description: The MajorVersion reflects the time of the last major change of the DataSet content. VersionTime in seconds since 2020-01-01T00:00:00UTC. The value 0 is used to indicate that no version information is available.

minorVersion.description: The MinorVersion reflects the time of the last change. VersionTime in seconds since 2020-01-01T00:00:00UTC. The value 0 is used to indicate that no version information is available.
